Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    iaik.asn1.structures.AlgorithmID.dsa_With_SHA1
    standard Algorithm Identifier for dsaWithSHA1 is dsaWithSHA1 (1.2.840.10040.4.3)
    iaik.asn1.structures.AlgorithmID.dsaWithSHA1_
    standard Algorithm Identifier for dsaWithSHA1 is dsaWithSHA1 (1.2.840.10040.4.3)
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    iaik.security.provider.IAIK.addAsJDK14Provider()
    use method IAIK.addAsProvider
    iaik.security.provider.IAIK.addAsJDK14Provider(boolean)
    use method IAIK.addAsProvider
    iaik.security.random.AWT11SeedGenerator.addEvent(AWTEvent)
    use addSeedObject() instead.
    iaik.security.random.AWT10SeedGenerator.addEvent(Event)
    use addSeedObject() instead.
    iaik.security.rsa.RSAPublicKey.crypt(BigInteger)
    Use iaik.pkcs.pkcs1.RSACipher#rawPublicRSA instead.
    iaik.security.rsa.RSAPrivateKey.crypt(BigInteger)
    Use iaik.pkcs.pkcs1.RSACipher#rawPrivateRSA instead.
    iaik.utils.CryptoUtils.extGcd(int, int)
    use NumberTheory.extGcd() instead
    iaik.utils.CryptoUtils.gcd(int, int)
    use NumberTheory.gcd() instead
    iaik.security.random.SeedGenerator.getDefaultSeedGenerator()
    use getDefault() instead.
    iaik.asn1.structures.PolicyQualifierInfo.getExplicitTest()
    only for compability to former versions, please use getExplicitText
    iaik.x509.extensions.PolicyConstraints.getInhibitExplicitPolicy()
    see getInhibitPolicyMapping()
    iaik.security.provider.IAIK.getMd5() 
    iaik.utils.CryptoUtils.getStrongPrime(int, Random)
    use NumberTheory.getStrongPrime() instead
    iaik.security.provider.IAIK.getUseOldMd5() 
    iaik.utils.CryptoUtils.resizeArray(byte[], int)
    Use the method in iaik.utils.Util instead.
    iaik.security.random.FIPS140Test.runTests()
    use startTests() instead.
    iaik.security.random.SecRandom.setDefault(Class)
    use setDefault(String)
    iaik.security.random.SeedGenerator.setDefaultSeedGenerator(SeedGenerator)
    use setDefault() instead.
    iaik.x509.extensions.PolicyConstraints.setInhibitExplicitPolicy(int)
    see setInhibitPolicyMapping()
    iaik.x509.X509CRL.setSignatureAlgorithm(ObjectID)
    use setSignatureAlgorithm(AlgorithmID);
    iaik.security.provider.IAIK.setUseOldMd5(boolean)
